title: Hero MotoCorp posts dismal 2% rise in August sales
description: Domestic sales were at 4,50,740 units as compared to 4,31,137 units in August 2021, a growth of 4.55 per cent, it added. Exports, however, declined to 11,868 units from 22,742 units in the corresponding period of last year. Motorcycles sales were up at 4,30,799 units last month from 4,20,609 units in the preceding year, while scooter sales declined to 31,809 units against 33,270 units in August last year.
